summary: An elegant retexture of the bar counters found in taverns and inns
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod so I'm not going toÂ guarantee anything. It works in my game, but I'm not sure how it will look in yours. If you use the textures somewhere else I only ask that you credit me for my work. Feel free to edit it to your liking if you know how to.

P.S. if you have any tips or suggestion for a novice Modder please comment them. Please don't be too harsh, like I said this is my first actual mod. Constructive criticism is always welcome.
author: Battlemage18
